The meaning of screaming in a dream. The wave in a dream can symbolize joy, weddings, and happy occasions in which the dreamer can participate, if the wave is applied on these occasions to his community. Whoever was He travels or his family travels and dreams of screaming in his dream. This is a sign either of the return of his relatives or his return in the near future. The wave in the dream can indicate the sects that the dreamer will form in the coming period or what he participates in. Some scholars see heresy as a sign of heresy committed by the dreamer or denied by the individual. According to the dreamer’s condition and the symbols of the vision. Interpretation of hearing in a dream: Whoever dreams of a wedding feasting and dancing in it, this indicates that a misfortune will befall him. Ugly in a dream can indicate sadness, death, and bad circumstances that the dreamer is going through, especially if insults are heard in such cases in the dreamer’s society. Interpretation of humiliation In a woman’s dream, ugly in a dream shows the woman’s bad character. Sarcasm in marriage means offensive, obscene, and immoral speech. Interpretation of a shipwreck in a pregnant woman’s dream. If the woman who dreamed was pregnant, and saw in her dream someone screaming, and the number reached three times, then this is an indication that she will give birth to a boy. If She saw that the number of flowers does not exceed one, then this is a sign that she will give birth to a girl. Other meanings in a dream of humiliation, according to the modern interpretation of the interpretation of appearance, or the version of worship in a dream, or hearing worship, as these are all indicators that indicate joys and good news or a reflection of positive energy on the dreamer. Success and success in something floating in one’s dream. Hearing playing in the dream of a bachelor or single woman indicates positive connotations and good news that will befall the single man during the coming period of his life. It is one of the good news in a dream, but it is not good to see an unmarried girl teasing herself in a dream. That flutters in a married woman’s dream. As for the interpretation of seeing and hearing buzzing in a married woman’s dream, it is one of the signs that bodes well if the flattery is not at the wedding or accompanied by dancing. or singing; Because hearing it at weddings portends worries, suffering. And problems. Seeing a mother’s Zangroda or a grandmother’s Zangroda indicates positive things in marital life. As for seeing a married woman entering her home and smiling, it is a harbinger of good news and happy events, God willing. That ripples in a dream about pregnancy. Hearing in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the indications that indicate sex. Child. In most Arab countries, women make 3 loud grooves when they give birth to a child to express their joy for him and when they give. A female was born, they let out a scream. Therefore, hearing a pregnant woman’s squealing in her sleep is an indication of the approaching time of labor and delivery, and a loud scream indicates a male baby, and a quiet scream is good news for a woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs in a dream in the reality of the dream and its interpretation is good, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs in a dream. Climbing stairs in a dream may mean achieving goals and ambitions during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of climbing the stairs of an airplane in a dream may indicate closeness to God Almighty, and avoiding... Sins and disobedience. In the event that someone saw that he was climbing the stairs of an airplane, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life during those days. Dreaming of climbing the stairs in a dream can indicate joyful changes and control over difficult life circumstances thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream Climbing a high place in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he was able to climb to a very high place could be a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams. Dreaming of climbing a high place in a dream may be a sign of the effort and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve his ambitions. In the case of a vision A person himself climbs high in a dream, as this may indicate that he will get what he wants during this period. Seeing a person that he has climbed to a high place may indicate the abundance of goodness and enormous livelihood that the dreamer will obtain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a staircase The mosque in a dream: Climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Whoever dreams that he is climbing the stairs may indicate that there are some obstacles in his life that stand in the way of his dreams. Seeing yourself climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream It may indicate that you are moving away from God, Blessed and Most High, and you need to repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. A dream of climbing a mosque tower in a dream may be a sign of bad changes occurring in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing an elevator in a dreamIf someone sees If oneself is climbing the elevator, this may indicate good changes occurring in his life during this time. A person’s dream that he was climbing the elevator may indicate the ease and comfort he is enjoying at that time. Seeing himself climbing the escalator in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions will be achieved Easily during this period. Seeing the elevator going up in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to it during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs with difficulty in a dream: Climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate the dreamer’s suffering in his life during those days. Anyone who dreams of climbing Stairs with difficulty indicate difficulty that the dreamer may suffer from during those days. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate severe pain and sadness that the dreamer will face during that period. When one sees that he was climbing the stairs with difficulty, this may indicate the severity of And the lack of time that the dreamer suffers from in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an ice mountain in a dream: If someone saw that he was climbing an ice mountain, this may indicate the dreamer’s good fortune. A dream about climbing an ice mountain may indicate happy events that happen to the dreamer in That time. Seeing a mountain of snow rising may indicate...

title: Interpretation of seeing my husband killing another person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my husband killing another person in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of seeing my husband killing another person in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some hardworking scholars, and the site administrators do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of the scholars.Interpretation of seeing my husband killing another person in a dreamIf a woman sees that her husband is killing another person in a dream, this may be a sign of the appearance of some... Serious problems and difficulties between them during this period. A dream that shows the husband killing another person in a dream could be a sign of serious disturbances occurring between them during these days and he should ask God for help. If someone saw in her dream that her husband was killing another person, it may indicate To bad changes that will occur in his life at that time, and God knows best. If you see one of the spouses killing another person in a dream, this may indicate disturbances between them or a financial problem that they may be exposed to during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband hitting his wife in front of His family in a dream: If a woman sees her husband beating her in front of his family, this may indicate his great love for her at that time. The husband hitting his wife in a dream may be a sign of the good relationship that exists between them. And God knows best. If a woman sees her husband beating her in front of his family in a dream, this may indicate changes in their lives during this time. And God knows best. A dream about a husband beating his wife in front of his family in a dream may indicate material gains and many good things that will come to them in those days by God’s grace. Interpretation of seeing my husband holding my hand in a dream If a woman sees that her husband was holding her hands in a dream, this may indicate A happy married life during that period, thanks to God. Dreaming of a husband holding a woman’s hand in a dream may indicate good changes that will occur in their lives during this period. Anyone who sees in her dream that her husband was holding her hands may indicate positive changes that will occur in their lives during that period. Seeing a husband holding a woman’s hand in a dream may indicate happy events that will happen to them on those days, and God knows best. Seeing a husband holding his wife’s hand in a dream may mean that he has overcome enemies or happy events that come his way on those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband defending his wife in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband was defending her in a dream, this may indicate protecting him from any harm or evil that he may face during those days. A dream about a husband defending his wife in front of his family in a dream may indicate emerging from a serious experience Or a problem that he suffers from in those days. If a woman sees her husband defending her, this indicates that he will protect her from any harm that she may be exposed to from those around her in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband kissing my feet in a dream: If a woman dreams that her husband is kissing her feet, This may indicate the intense love that existed between them

title: Learn about the interpretation of snakes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of snakes in a dream Interpreters agree on the idea that the appearance of snakes in a dream is not pleasant for the dreamer, because the pressures in his life increase and difficult circumstances increase until he feels lost and afraid of the many events he is experiencing. In our topic, we deal with the interpretation of snakes in a dream. Interpretation of snakes in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of snakes in a dream? There are many signs that snakes are pregnant in a dream, the most important of which is the presence of a harmful enemy in the dreamer’s life, and from here we warn the person who sees this dream from some of the people around him. As one of them is his greatest enemy. The appearance of snakes in a person’s dream may prove that the person is exposed to deadly envy that harms him in more than one aspect. It may be his academic or practical failure or entering into a heated argument with his family. As for killing them in a dream, it is one of the best signs for the fortuneteller. Because it is a clear sign of the end of the struggle you are experiencing and the achievement of victory in many matters. If you see a black snake in your dream, there are many predictions by dream interpreters who say that you will soon be defeated by an intelligent and cunning person who you thought was one of your loved ones. The meaning of the dream varies depending on the type and color The snake, because the yellow color is a sign of intense envy and a severe illness that can befall the dreamer, and God knows best. As for the white snake, it emphasizes various meanings, including money and livelihood, and it may indicate the appearance of betrayal in the dreamer while a friend is awake. What is the interpretation of snakes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin sees You will see that the best dreams related to seeing snakes are killing them in a dream, because it foretells the person’s stability in his life and the great successes that he will witness soon. It is possible for the interpretation of the dream to be reversed if the person finds that he killed the white snake, as if the girl was related, so he failed in his relationship, and as a married woman. There are sad signs that indicate that the husband is far from her. There are difficult matters confirmed by the exposure of a snake to someone in his dream, because he may suffer from stressful worries due to the large number of enemies around him, and if there is more than one snake in his dream and they are chasing him, then his interpretation suffers with the large number of deceivers. A snake bite is one of the things that brings the complexity and difficulty of life to God, and escaping it and being able to escape indicates the upcoming escape from worries and difficulties. The abundance of snakes in the house is not an expression of kindness, but rather a confirmation of the large number of enemies, the human control over human pressures, and the discomfort of life for To him.To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars.Interpretation of snakes in a dream for a single womanThe appearance of snakes in a person’s dream is one of the matters that requires attention, as it is a typical sign of evil and many enemies. If she finds that she owns one of the snakes and can control it, it can be said that she occupies an important position that establishes a different and happy life for her. If she sees this snake in her house, the dream does not lead her to good, because the significance is that there is an enemy inside this house from

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a bridge in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bridge in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The appearance of a bridge in a dream has many connotations, and depending on the condition of the bridge and the material from which it is made, the dream will be interpreted. Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and Miller were interested in its interpretation because of the many questions about the dreamers on this subject, and since we are on an Egyptian website, We want to provide all the important interpretations of your dreams. You will now read the interpretations of your dream related to seeing the bridge in a dream through the following. The bridge in a dreamThe bridge symbol is not one of those symbols that cannot be interpreted with one or two signs, but it is interpreted through dozens of clues that we will present in the points The following differences: The bridge may refer to the dreamer who has children and enjoys the blessing of good offspring, noting that if a married man or woman, as well as a pregnant woman, dreams of the same dream, it will be interpreted with the same interpretation mentioned. Above and with the development of many other interpretations that agree with each of them. A strong bridge or bridge is interpreted differently from a weak bridge that may fall at any time. The small size of the bridge in a dream is an undesirable sign and indicates the difficulty of achieving its goal in waking life. If The dreamer wanted to create wealth. In fact, walking on a small bridge in a dream indicates that he will do his best and work for many years of his life until he achieves his goal in life. The dreamer’s desired goal may be to recover from an illness, and this dream is interpreted to mean that he will not He will quickly recover from his illness, but he will be very tired until he gets rid of it and regains his strength and energy. Emotions in a dream can change their interpretation from negative to positive and vice versa, which means that if the dreamer crosses the bridge in his dream and his heart is full of terror and panic, then this vision is not worthy of praise. This indicates that he needs more. The potential and ability to prepare to achieve his goals in the future, and one of the scholars said that he suffers from confusion and anxiety in his life. However, if he crossed it in the dream with the utmost stability and strength, this is a sign that he has personal and spiritual capabilities that make him ready to accept any sudden circumstances in his life in the short term. And long, moreover the dream shows it. Courage and good handling of situations in their various forms and their effects on him. If the dreamer stands on the bridge in his sleep without moving, then this dream is interpreted by the vicissitudes of his life, and he is also a character who does not have the ability to confront, and therefore prefers to escape and avoid problems rather than confront them. them and find the appropriate solution for them. If the dreamer was walking on the bridge in his dream and saw that he fell from it, the meaning of this dream is related to the feelings of fear and anxiety that he feels for his future, because he fears loss and failure. He also does not have a high degree of self-confidence, and therefore he will feel He is always unsure of his success in many things, and he will have an inner feeling that the future is full of problems, and this means that the pessimistic outlook will affect him severely, so it is better for him to trust himself and make strong plans for his life and leave behind success.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out for a girl?

preview.html: Teeth are a sign of a woman's beauty that you cannot see any flaw or evil. He also takes good care of them, keeps them clean, and makes sure they are always sparkling white. But in some cases, a married woman is exposed to seeing her teeth falling out, breaking, or breaking, so she does not know what the interpretation of this vision is and what appears on her, so she feels anxious and confused about what she saw. He seeks to reach a logical explanation for his vision, so in the following lines we will show you the exact explanation, and according to dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The famous dream interpreter Ibn Sirin saw that seeing teeth falling out in a dream is not good in most of its cases, such as he saw that teeth in a dream symbolize The dreamer's family and relatives, and the representatives are the pillars of the house he makes, and on its foundation. He pointed out that the upper jaw represents the dreamer’s family of men and the lower jaw represents the family of women. He added that in some cases, the upper jaw indicates a vision from the father, while the lower jaw shows its strength from the mother. Falling teeth in a dream is strong evidence that the dreamer or one of his family members is suffering from an illness or disease, and a toothache in a dream is evidence of the presence of clouds above the viewer. Which God does not want, which bothers them. Many are already worried about sleep. However, Ibn Sirin narrated that the loss of a married woman’s teeth is sometimes evidence of her longevity if all her teeth fall out in a dream. But if only one person falls out, then this dream does not bode well, as it is a sign of death. A loved one, especially if the tooth disappears and she never sees it again. A tooth that falls on the dreamer's stone is a sign that she will give birth. If you are expecting this, then this dream portends the fulfillment of your desire, God willing. Losing the ability to eat due to a falling out tooth in a dream is considered evidence of losing money or poverty for the dreamer, God forbid. Whoever sees in a dream that a tooth fell out without blood, then this dream indicates That God will grant him a blessed life. This vision may indicate that the woman’s menstrual cycle will soon stop and therefore she will not be able to have children again. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman losing her teeth. Interpretation scholars have indicated that a married woman’s dream of her teeth falling out indicates that there are many responsibilities entrusted to her It makes her feel confused and unable to think or plan well. If a married woman sees that her teeth have fallen out, her vision indicates that there is something disturbing the tranquility of her married life and that she is struggling to get rid of it. A married woman’s dream of her children falling out of her teeth is a sign of her feeling of fear and anxiety. Severe towards her children. This dream may indicate the dreamer’s children’s desire for independence in their lives and self-reliance. The falling out of the front teeth in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she and her husband will face a number of problems, but they will not last long and will end well. Some have interpreted this vision as It is a sign of the fortuneteller's desperation to achieve anything or that she is unable to have children. title: Seeing a baby in a dream for a man

preview.html: As for male children, they have some negative connotations, which we will point out in this article from our interpreter website, so follow the following lines. Interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream about a single girl The appearance of a young child in the dream of an unmarried girl. It expresses the bad state that the dreamer is going through due to disappointment, successive disappointment and loss of hope. There are other interpretations that say that the appearance of the child if he is beautiful wearing clean clothes and the dreamer is happy to see him. It is a sign that good will come soon in her life. Also, in her dream she was carrying a child in her arms. It causes a lot of anxiety about her life and bears the consequences of this heavy burden. As if the girl saw that she was changing the baby's clothes to other clean and suitable clothes for him in a dream. This means that she is trying hard to fix things in her life. He seeks to change the circumstances surrounding him in order to live the life he desires. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream and its meaning Interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream for a married woman It is said that seeing a child in a dream is delayed in childbirth. Evidence that God hopes to achieve the dream of motherhood. And God rewards her with everything she desires, because she must Be patient, calculate and trust in God. But if the dreamer has children, and sees a child in a dream. She suffers in her life and has a constant dispute with her husband, and God knows best. When a married woman sees in her dream a beautiful little boy with a smiling face. It is good news, prosperity and happiness, God willing. Likewise, the birth of a man in a dream for a married woman is evidence that the dreamer is entering a stage full of worries, problems and many complaints, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream about a man and its meaning Interpretation scholars say that the infant in a man’s dream is evidence that the fortuneteller is entering a new stage that will change his life for the better, God willing. As well as seeing a young child who has passed the breastfeeding stage in a dream. It is considered one of the visions, and it is not good, and it involves many worries and judgments. Also, seeing a child in pain in a dream indicates the fortuneteller’s unfortunate luck, and his failure in many matters, and God knows best. Whoever sees a young child vomiting in a dream, this means that he will make a big mistake. He needs to fix this mistake quickly, so as not to get involved in it too much. She suffers from severe anxiety and fear for her fetus, and the closer her due date gets, the more afraid she becomes. When a pregnant woman sees in her sleep that she gave birth to a beautiful woman, and she saw her in a dream. And she was happy about that, it is good news for an easy birth and a livelihood that will come, God willing. title: Learn about the interpretation of bleeding in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Bleeding in a dreamInterpreters believe that the dream carries many interpretations that vary according to the color and smell of the blood, and was it a lot or a little? Does it hurt the dreamer when he bleeds? In the lines of the article, we will talk about the interpretation of bleeding for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men according to Ibn Sirin and interpretive scholars. Bleeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin Bleeding in a dream The vision indicates that money is forbidden, so if the dreamer sees that he is bleeding a lot, he must reconsider the sources of his money, and stay away from what angers him. Our Lord Almighty. Bleeding in a dream indicates the occurrence of major family disputes, and if the dreamer bleeds from his mouth or head in a dream, then he must return to God (Almighty) and repent to Him, because the vision is an indication of committing a crime. Sins and sins. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is bleeding from feces, this means that he will soon get rid of his worries and sorrows, and if he feels internal bleeding without seeing blood, this means that he will find a very new job. Thus. Scientists believe that bleeding with urine portends bad things, as it indicates receiving a bribe or oppressing an orphan, and the vision symbolizes problems at work. Bleeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the fortuneteller bleeds a little blood in a dream, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money in some way. He does not expect it soon. If the dreamer sees that he is bleeding in the street, the vision indicates that he will not pay zakat money, but seeing blood from the mouth is evidence that you will obtain many benefits and good things from work. If the dreamer sees a drop of blood falling in his dream, this means That a lot of positive things will happen soon in his life and that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will grant him success and blessings, but if the dreamer feels weak after that. Bleeding in a dream, this leads to a financial loss that he will suffer in the coming days. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, which includes thousands of interpretations by major interpretive scholars. Bleeding in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of bleeding blood for an unmarried woman is a sign of kindness and blessing if It was from the vagina and the dream also symbolizes the approaching marriage and also indicates a pleasant event that will soon knock on her door and make her happy and reassured. In the event that the dreamer bleeds a little blood in the vision, this indicates the presence of a handsome and kind-hearted young man who will propose to her soon. If the dreamer is engaged and dreams that she Bleeding profusely, the dream symbolizes problems with her partner in the coming days that may lead to separation. Seeing bleeding for a girl who is going through some difficulties in her life brings her good news of distress and freedom from problems and obstacles, but if her nose is bleeding, the dream symbolizes an insult she committed. to someone earlier. Period, and it was said: The dream portends a delay in marriage, and God Almighty knows best. Nosebleeds in a single woman’s dream: If the dreamer saw that her nose was bleeding in a dream and she had disagreements with her family at the present time, then the vision foretells her that the problems will end and that solutions will be found that satisfy everyone. The dream indicates brilliance

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person buying a house for a neighborhood person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying a house for a living person in a dream and tireless efforts to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person buying a house for a living person in a dream. A dream about a dead person buying a house for a living person in a dream may indicate the happiness that the living person feels at that time, And God knows best. If you see the deceased buying a house for the neighborhood in a dream, this may indicate many good things that will come to the dreamer in the coming days, and God knows best. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased has bought a new house for the person, may indicate many material gains. Which the dreamer will acquire during this period by the grace of God. In the case of a dream about buying a new home for life, this may indicate good and positive changes that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying furniture in a dream in the event that one sees that the deceased was buying furniture For the home, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the dreamer to a large extent during this period. When you see the deceased buying furniture in the neighborhood in a dream, this may indicate good changes that occur to the dreamer during this period, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of a dead person buying furniture for the home in A dream may indicate great livelihood and good events that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Seeing the deceased buying furniture for his home in a dream may indicate changes that will happen to the people of the house or joys that will come to them, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying vegetables in a dream in the event that You saw the dead person buying vegetables in a dream, this may indicate the great choices that come to the dreamer at that time thanks to God. When you see the dead buying vegetables for the living in your dream, this may indicate the abundance of a good and ample diet that you will have during this time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that the deceased was buying vegetables for the living may indicate future joys for the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. In the event that he sees the deceased buying vegetables, this could indicate the end of the debts and financial crises that the dreamer faced in the previous period, thanks to God. Interpretation of dreams for the dead is that Buying fish in a dream: If one sees that the deceased was buying fish in a dream, this may indicate that the worries and sorrows of the dreamer’s life have ended during this period, thanks to God. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was buying fish, could indicate rejection of the intense sadness that was The dreamer is suffering from it at that time, and God knows best. A dream of a deceased person buying fish in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. If one sees a deceased person buying medicine in a dream, this may indicate his faults that were present in his life, and God knows best. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a black dog

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a black dog: There was much evidence of seeing dogs due to disagreement among jurists about its true meaning. Some consider dogs to be abhorrent and a sign of enemies and hateful actions, and in this article we explain all the interpretations of seeing a black dog, its meaning. Hunting and the meaning behind a dog bite or attack, where we list the details that differ from one person to another with more clarification and explanation. Interpretation of a dream about a black dog: Seeing dogs indicates excessive troubles and worries, and they are a lukewarm enemy or enemies who lack skill and horsemanship, and whoever sees a black dog symbolizes the devil or What whispers in the soul, which is a symbol of tricks, conspiracies and thieves. Whoever sees a rabid black dog indicates plunder, theft, and banditry, and if the dog dies, this indicates evil, corruption, and bad morals and character. However, if the black dog is slaughtered, it indicates randomness and being far from reason. Seeing a black dog expresses the person who is hostile to the dreamer, and wants evil and evil. He is a weak enemy, but he shows his strength, even if the black dog is in the house, this is a sign of envy and evil cunning. It may indicate differences arising from listening to the obsessions of the soul and the obsessions of the devil. Interpretation of a dream about a black dog by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that dogs indicate bad companions, deceitful people, and evil people, and a dog is a foolish person or an enemy of young horsemen, and whoever sees a mad dog is a thief or a thief with no morals. While the black dog is a ferocious enemy in its hatred, hatred, and malice. Seeing black dogs represents religious persecutors and corrupt people who spread fashions and rumors and sow doubts in hearts and souls. Among the symbols of the black dog, it indicates a lack of morals, a lack of education, a violation of common sense, and confrontation of hateful actions. Whoever sees a wild black dog, this indicates a man who has no religion or modesty, does not adhere to values ​​and customs, violates them, conspires against people, and invents tricks and conspiracies to hunt prey. Interpretation of a dream about a black dog for a single woman: To see a black dog symbolizes someone who desires her and does not want good from her. A suitor may approach her who holds a grudge against her or misleads her from the truth and manipulates her. But if the dog is white, then this is an enemy who covers him with hostility and hatred and shows her love and friendship. If you see him killing the black dog, this indicates victory over the enemy and mastery of it, and salvation from imminent evil and imminent danger. I dreamed of a black dog chasing me for a single woman. If she sees a black dog chasing her, then this is a foolish man trying to trap her, and this may indicate bad owners, and if she sees a stray black dog chasing her, then she may become prey to swindlers. And if the black dog is chasing the dreamer in the desert, then this It indicates a person who steals her rights and prevents her from achieving her goals and objectives. And if dogs run after them, this is a competition between them and one of them, as the vision indicates psychological and nervous pressures. Interpretation of dreams about a black dog biting me for a single woman. Seeing a black dog bite indicates serious harm from an enemy who appears strong and weak. If a dog bites her and eats her flesh, there is someone
